newsitem.title: USA: Cornerstone to register one mln units.
newsitem.headline: Cornerstone to register one mln units.

text.p: Cornerstone Propane Partners LP said Wednesday it will register an additional one million units for future acquisitions.
The retail propane marketer said the units are in addition to the 750,000 units it registered in April, most of which it issued to pay for acquisitions this year.

Cornerstone Wednesday reported a net loss of $8.2 million, or $0.49 per unit, for its fourth quarter ended June 30. This compares with a pro forma loss of $9.9 million, or $0.60 per unit, over the same period last year.
